column1: #text=Yesterday , I decided to visit my sister who lives a few towns away .
#text=I wanted to take the train because it is cheaper than putting gas in my car .
#text=So I drove to the train station and parked my car in the parking lot .
#text=I walked to the cashier 's window and waited in line .
#text=Once I reached the front of the line , I greeted the cashier and bought a train ticket .
#text=I walked to the train platform and waited for the train to arrive .
#text=When the train finally arrived , I got on the train and located my seat , which was printed on my ticket .
#text=I sat in my seat and took out the magazine that I had brought to read on the ride .
#text=The train eventually started back up and left the station .
#text=Before long , a ticket taker came over and asked for my ticket to verify that I had paid for my ride and was in the correct seat .
#text=I greeted the ticket taker and gave him my ticket .
#text=When I arrived at my sister 's city , I got off the train and she was there to meet me at the station .
